20101226023353.000|20101226023359.000|CC1|OF "OPERATION IN THEIR BOOTS."  
20101226023359.000|20101226023405.000|CC1|THE FILMS CAN BE VIEWED ONLINE. 
20101226023405.000|20101226023407.000|CC1|>> THE WHOLE POINT BEHIND THIS  
20101226023407.000|20101226023409.000|CC1|PROJECT WAS NOT ONLY TO TELL    
20101226023409.000|20101226023411.000|CC1|THESE INCREDIBLY UNIQUE STORIES 
20101226023411.000|20101226023412.000|CC1|FROM THESE UNIQUE PERSPECTIVES, 
20101226023412.000|20101226023414.000|CC1|BUT TO CULTIVATE THE SKILLS AND 
20101226023414.000|20101226023418.000|CC1|THE CAREERS OF THESE EMERGING   
20101226023418.000|20101226023418.000|CC1|FILMMAKERS.                     
20101226023418.000|20101226023421.000|CC1|IT DOESN'T END HERE FOR THEM.   
20101226023421.000|20101226023422.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PATRICK HEALY,     
20101226023422.000|20101226023422.000|CC1|CHANNEL 4 NEWS.

20101226023635.000|20101226023637.000|CC1|WHAT ABOUT THOSE GIFTS THAT WERE
20101226023637.000|20101226023639.000|CC1|NOT ON YOUR WISH LIST?          
20101226023639.000|20101226023640.000|CC1|WHAT IF YOU DON'T LIKE THEM.    
20101226023640.000|20101226023641.000|CC1|REMEMBER THREE THINGS IF YOU

20101226023644.000|20101226023646.000|CC1|OF TIME TO RETURN THOSE GIFTS.  
20101226023646.000|20101226023648.000|CC1|EVERY RETAILER HAS IT OWN RULES.
20101226023648.000|20101226023651.000|CC1|COSTCO, FOR EXAMPLE, GIVES YOU  
20101226023651.000|20101226023652.000|CC1|90 DAYS FOR ITEMS LIKE COMPUTERS
20101226023652.000|20101226023653.000|CC1|AND CAMCORDERS.

20101226023655.000|20101226023656.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT STORES ARE GENERALLY 
20101226023656.000|20101226023657.000|CC1|ABOUT MORE LIBERAL, BUT HERE'S  
20101226023657.000|20101226023658.000|CC1|THE CATCH.

20101226023701.000|20101226023702.000|CC1|GIFT RECEIPTS.

20101226023704.000|20101226023705.000|CC1|WALMART, BUT YOU DO AT MOST
